Name: IOC Rule ip, domain, url, hash
Query: sourcetype="*" eql select * from _source_ where (dst_ip in ('203.0.113.5', '198.51.100.7') or dst_host in ('example.com', 'anotherdomain.net', 'thirdexample.org') or url in ('http://example.com', 'https://anotherdomain.net', 'http://thirdexample.org') or hash in ('abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890', '1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef', 'fedcba0987654321fedcba0987654321'))
